short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Non-Custodial Multisig Crypto Wallet that supports 13 blockchain and 10000+ Tokens

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cryptocurrency multisig wallet that provides a simple and secure way for users to manage their funds and  access DApps. 

🤝 Group Control: Ideal for businesses and organizations, enabling multiple stakeholders to jointly approve transactions.

⚙️ Tailored Wallet Configuration: Need 2-of-3? 3-of-5? Or any other unique configuration? Customize to fit your needs perfectly.

🌍 Seamless integration with numerous cryptocurrencies

🔒 Non-Custodial Wallet: Your keys, your assets. We never control your funds.

🌟 User-Friendly Design: Whether you're a crypto novice or a blockchain expert, our platform ensures an effortless setup and user experience.

Dive into the future of cryptocurrency management with TotalSig. Empower yourself with unmatched security, flexibility, and ease of use. Perfect for everyone, from individual users to large enterprises.
